properties.query:
// generated function structure for custom log ABAP_ADR6_CL 
// generated on 2022-09-12 
// Sentinel4SAP solution version 2.0.20 
// note that ABAP_ADR6_CL custom log has been enhanced with the SAP agent version 60075287 to show user names and restricted only to SAP users
// get the user MD lookback period 
let UserMDLookBack = totimespan(toscalar(SAPGetParameters('UserMDLookBack')| project-keep ValueLow));

let D_ABAP_ADR6_CL = datatable(TimeGenerated:datetime 
,CLIENT:string
,BNAME:string
,ADDRNUMBER:string
,PERSNUMBER:string
,DATE_FROM:string
,CONSNUMBER:string
,FLGDEFAULT:string
,FLG_NOUSE:string
,HOME_FLAG:string
,SMTP_ADDR:string
,SMTP_SRCH:string
,DFT_RECEIV:string
,R3_USER:string
,ENCODE:string
,TNEF:string
,VALID_FROM:string
,VALID_TO:string
,_DATAAGING:string
,SystemID:string
,Type:string
)['1000-01-01T00:00:00Z','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString','initialString'];

let T_ABAP_ADR6_CL = (ABAP_ADR6_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(UserMDLookBack)
| project 
TimeGenerated = column_ifexists('TimeGenerated', '1000-01-01T00:00:00Z')
,CLIENT = column_ifexists('CLIENT_s', 'initialString')
,BNAME = column_ifexists('BNAME_s', 'initialString')
,ADDRNUMBER = column_ifexists('ADDRNUMBER_s', 'initialString')
,PERSNUMBER = column_ifexists('PERSNUMBER_s', 'initialString')
,DATE_FROM = column_ifexists('DATE_FROM_s', 'initialString')
,CONSNUMBER = column_ifexists('CONSNUMBER_s', 'initialString')
,FLGDEFAULT = column_ifexists('FLGDEFAULT_s', 'initialString')
,FLG_NOUSE = column_ifexists('FLG_NOUSE_s', 'initialString')
,HOME_FLAG = column_ifexists('HOME_FLAG_s', 'initialString')
,SMTP_ADDR = column_ifexists('SMTP_ADDR_s', 'initialString')
,SMTP_SRCH = column_ifexists('SMTP_SRCH_s', 'initialString')
,DFT_RECEIV = column_ifexists('DFT_RECEIV_s', 'initialString')
,R3_USER = column_ifexists('R3_USER_s', 'initialString')
,ENCODE = column_ifexists('ENCODE_s', 'initialString')
,TNEF = column_ifexists('TNEF_s', 'initialString')
,VALID_FROM = column_ifexists('VALID_FROM_s', 'initialString')
,VALID_TO = column_ifexists('VALID_TO_s', 'initialString')
,_DATAAGING = column_ifexists('_DATAAGING_s', 'initialString')
,SystemID = column_ifexists('SystemID_s', 'initialString')
,Type = column_ifexists('Type', 'initialString')
);

T_ABAP_ADR6_CL | union isfuzzy= true (D_ABAP_ADR6_CL  | where TimeGenerated != '1000-01-01T00:00:00Z')
